程序包 uestc.zhanghanwen.ATTCK.GraphCRUDServices.RetrieveServices

接口 RetrieveService

所有已知实现类:
RetrieveGroupServiceImpl, RetrieveMatrixServiceImpl, RetrieveMitigationServiceImpl, RetrieveServiceImplement, RetrieveSoftwareServiceImpl, RetrieveTacticServiceImpl, RetrieveTechniqueServiceImpl
public interface RetrieveService
The interface for all Services inside. This is the interface oriented mode, that makes easier for RetrieveServiceBundle to manage all services.
版本:
1.0
作者:
zhanghanwen
另请参阅:
  • RetrieveServiceBundle

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    ResultWrapper
    findAll(String type, int page, int size)
    Get all nodes by type, with page and size specified.
    if page is both -1, then return all results.
    ResultWrapper
    findByMitreId(String mitreId)
    Get the node by its mitre id.
    ResultWrapper
    findByName(String name)
    Get the node by its name.
    ResultWrapper
    findRelatedNodes(String startNodeMitreId)
    Find all related nodes of one node.
    ResultWrapper
    findRelationship(String startNodeMitreId, String endNodeMitreId)
    Return the specified relationship name between two given nodes.

  • 方法详细资料

    • findByMitreId

      ResultWrapper findByMitreId(String mitreId) throws Exception
      Get the node by its mitre id.
      参数:
      mitreId - mitre id
      返回:
      ResultWrapper of the queried result.
      抛出:
      Exception - if NodeRepository.findByMitreId(java.lang.String) fails

    • findByName

      ResultWrapper findByName(String name) throws Exception
      Get the node by its name.
      参数:
      name - name
      返回:
      ResultWrapper of the queried result.
      抛出:
      Exception - if NodeRepository.findByName(java.lang.String) fails

    • findAll

      ResultWrapper findAll(String type, int page, int size) throws Exception
      Get all nodes by type, with page and size specified.
      if page is both -1, then return all results.
      参数:
      type - the specified type.
      page - page, start from 0.
      size - size, how many records in one page.
      返回:
      ResultWrapper of all queried results.
      抛出:
      Exception - if Neo4jRepository.findAll() fails

    • findRelatedNodes

      ResultWrapper findRelatedNodes(String startNodeMitreId) throws Exception
      Find all related nodes of one node.
      参数:
      startNodeMitreId - mitre id of the start node.
      返回:
      ResultWrapper of all queried results.
      抛出:
      Exception - if NodeRepository.findRelatedByStartNodeMitreId(java.lang.String) fails

    • findRelationship

      ResultWrapper findRelationship(String startNodeMitreId, String endNodeMitreId) throws Exception
      Return the specified relationship name between two given nodes.
      参数:
      startNodeMitreId - the mitre id of the start node.
      endNodeMitreId - the mitre id of the end node.
      返回:
      ResultWrapper containing the relationship name.
      抛出:
      Exception - if NodeRepository.findRelationshipByMitreId(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) fails
